Hi all, I am wondering how long the tosa tsuba smiths worked as I have mention on them in my books but they all seem to around the early mid 1600's. I am curious as to a tsuba signed Toshu Ju Kuniyoshi Saku and am wondering if anyone knows of this smith ?? It looks very much like an Akasaka piece.

cheers all

Rich
